green_process: TRUE; Singh and his group collaborated with researchers from the U.S. Department of Energy’s National Renewable Energy Laboratory to develop a 200-kilowatt, 1,050-volt silicon carbide inverter, which is now used in the 644K and the 944K. title: POSCO to launch Greenate, its master brand for carbon neutrality, as an initiative for a sustainable future - POSCO
summary: POSCO, a leading steel company, has launched Greenate, a carbon-neutral master brand, which includes Steel, Tech & Process, and Infrastructure sub-brands. POSCO's flagship eco-friendly brand Greenate consists of three categories: Steel, Tech & Process, and Infrastructure, and covers POSCO's eco-friendly steel products, low-carbon steel technology and processes such as hydrogen reduction iron and steel making, and eco-friendly infrastructure to achieve carbon neutrality. POSCO also introduced Greenate certified steelTM, a mass-balance principle product that effectively reduces carbon emissions by distributing the emissions saved through the implementation of low-carbon production processes and the use of low-carbon steel.

title: Rising Volumes: Recent trends in India's power trading sector - Power Line Magazine - Power Line Magazine
summary: The Indian power sector is transitioning towards renewable energy, and energy markets are evolving to facilitate its adoption. Several new regulations, market reforms, and product launches are expected to contribute to the power market's expansion in the coming years. The implementation of new regulations and market reforms, such as market coupling, ancillary service markets, and derivatives, will significantly transform the electricity market in India.

title: Ignite Ideas Fund Round 10 recipients announced - Ventures - University of Queensland - UQ Ventures
summary: The Queensland Government's Ignite Ideas Fund has awarded over $1.42 million to 11 startups and small-to-medium sized businesses to help them develop and commercialise innovative products and services. These innovations span a range of industries including tourism, agriculture, manufacturing, renewable energy, technology, engineering and construction. One of the funded startups is ExtrasJar, which has developed a self-insurance investment approach to address the insurance affordability crisis.

summary: Suma is launching a new range of organic kombuchas that are craft-brewed and traditionally fermented from natural ingredients. title: Tesco Express overhaul with 50 cheaper own-brand products to hit shelves within fortnight - Express
summary: Tesco is replacing over 50 product lines in its convenience stores with cheaper alternatives, as shoppers seek to reduce their spending amid the cost of living crisis. The move comes as the supermarket giant faces competition from German discounters Aldi and Lidl, which have seen strong sales growth in recent months. Tesco said the own-brand alternatives being introduced are, on average, over 40 percent cheaper than the branded products they are replacing.
